name: DOCX Strict, (Office Open XML, WordprocessingML) ISO 29500-1:2008-2012, also ECMA-376, Editions 2-4.
definition: A format for word-processing documents in the Open Office XML (ISO 29500) format family.  The Strict variant of DOCX was introduced during the standardization in ISO/IEC 29500 in 2008; disallowed are a variety of elements and attributes that support treatment of legacy errors and features in other word-processors and deprecated VML markup for drawings.  The ability to read Strict DOCX files was implemented in Microsoft's Word 2010; Word 2013 added the ablity to write Strict files as an option.
